title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum
Describe change (1 point)

· Genetic variation is decreasing

Provide reasoning (1 point)

· SEM gets smaller
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Describe change (1 point)

· Genetic variation is decreasing

Provide reasoning (1 point)

· SEM gets smaller

Student response earns one of the available points.

Describe change (1 point)

· Genetic variation is decreasing

Provide reasoning (1 point)

· SEM gets smaller

Student response earns two of the available points.

Describe change (1 point)

· Genetic variation is decreasing

Provide reasoning (1 point)

· SEM gets smaller

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 points maximum

· Sexual selection for individuals with more spots

· Random mating behavior resulted in increased number of spots by chance
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

· Sexual selection for individuals with more spots

· Random mating behavior resulted in increased number of spots by chance

Student response earns one of the available points.

· Sexual selection for individuals with more spots

· Random mating behavior resulted in increased number of spots by chance

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

· Directional selection against individuals with large numbers of spots

· Directional selection for individuals with fewer spots

· Natural selection used in context

· Genetic drift resulted in several generations of decreased numbers of spots
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

· Directional selection against individuals with large numbers of spots

· Directional selection for individuals with fewer spots

· Natural selection used in context

· Genetic drift resulted in several generations of decreased numbers of spots
